abstract: Michael Wise will join the bank from Goldman Sachs, where he was head of equity market offerings for financial institutions.
snippet: Michael Wise will join the bank from Goldman Sachs, where he was head of equity market offerings for financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Michael Wise, a banker specializing in equity sales for financial institutions, as a vice chairman of global equity capital markets, the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Monday.

headline.main: Bank of America Merrill Lynch Hires Banker for Equity Capital Markets

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
